name: pikashunium-z--held
effect: Held: Allows cap-wearing pikachu to upgrade thunderbolt into 10 000 000 volt thunderbolt.
short_effect: Held: Allows cap-wearing Pikachu to upgrade Thunderbolt into 10,000,000 Volt Thunderbolt.

flavor_text.sword-shield: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power. It upgrades a Thunderbolt by Pikachu in a cap to a Z-Move.
